data.description:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1770979776428-3jd26f.
Objective: Implement hotkey features (shift-o notes, lightbox default) and land multi-terminal + orchestration command center after blockers resolve
Agent plan:
- 2 x frontend (keyboard/UX)
- 1 x frontend (terminal/orchestration)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-75n: shift o hotkey to create notes
- foolery-ajb: show hot key lightbox by default
- foolery-cxc: multi terminal support
- foolery-mqv.2.6: Orchestration v2 command center (Now/Next/Later + Ship Next)
Notes: foolery-cxc blocked by foolery-s3q (outside p0 scope). foolery-mqv.2.6 blocked by foolery-mqv.2.5 + foolery-mqv.5 (both p1, in verification) and foolery-s3q. Blockers must clear before these start. foolery-75n and foolery-ajb are independent and can begin immediately.
Assumptions:
- foolery-s3q (not in p0 set) will be resolved before wave 2 items that depend on it
- foolery-mqv.2.5 and foolery-mqv.5 (p1, stage:verification) will pass verification and unblock foolery-mqv.2.6
- foolery-iki and foolery-k18 are related enough to assign to one agent
- foolery-11j verification requires manual QA or automated test confirmation
